component.name: Netbeans 12.0
component.summary: Apache NetBeans, The Smarter Way to Code

description.p: Apache NetBeans IDE lets you quickly and easily develop Java desktop, Java EE, and web applications, as well as HTML5 applications with HTML, JavaScript, and CSS. The IDE also provides a great set of tools for PHP and C/C++ developers. It is free and open source and has a large community of users and developers around the world.
Disclaimer: This is a convenience binary of Apache NetBeans IDE, this is not an official release.
